name: Fortified Atta
description: Micronutrients are important for the human body. Micronutrients like Iron, Folic acid and Vitamin B 12 are recognized to take part in various metabolic activities of the body, and thereby, may support growth and development process of an individual with an active lifestyle. National and International bodies like ICMR, WHO/FAO also recommend a daily dietary intake of micronutrients like vitamins and minerals along with macronutrients,and hence have initiated many fortification programmes to enhance the micronutrient intake by an individual.Hours of study and extensive research makes Aashirvaad Fortified Atta a high# source of nutrients like Iron, Folic acid and Vitamin B12, which gives you a wholesome meal with no compromise in taste.
